meanings.definition: Of or relating to seaweeds of the genus Laminaria.
meanings.sent1: The laminarian plants swayed gently in the ocean currents.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the laminarian ecosystem in the deep sea.
meanings.sent3: The laminarian seaweed threw a party for all the other sea creatures.
meanings.sent4: Her laminarian personality was as steady and calming as the ocean waves.
meanings.sent5: The laminarian colors of the seaweed painted a beautiful underwater landscape.

meanings.definition: A seaweed of the genus Laminaria.
meanings.sent1: The laminarian was harvested for its nutritious properties.
meanings.sent2: She collected a bunch of laminarian to use in her cooking.
meanings.sent3: The laminarian tried to sneak into the mermaid's garden to play hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: The laminarian stood tall like a forest in the underwater world.
meanings.sent5: The laminarian danced gracefully with the ocean currents.
